title: All-Rounder Gaming Headset
body: I'm looking for an all-rounder gaming headset with great sound quality that I can use for gaming (League and CS:GO) and for listening to music on my iPhone and PC. I was looking at the Siberia V3. Any thoughts or suggestions?

replies.body:
Ew, if you want good sound quality just buy some decent headphones and then a mic. 
I've like, worn the Siberia V3 and thought they were broken by how gross the sound quality is.
So yah, go for like, a sennheiser/mod mic combo.
